title: Crescent Collects $3.2 Billion in Largest Credit Secondary Fund
description: Crescent Capital Group collected $3.2 billion for a fund that allows it to hold on to some of its private credit investments for longer, marking the largest raise for a vehicle dedicated to credit secondaries so far.
content: Crescent Capital Group collected $3.2 billion for a fund that allows it to hold on to some of its private credit investments for longer, marking the largest raise for a vehicle dedicated to credit secondaries so far.
